rules_text:
[i]Charming Flower [/i]– {T}: Add one mana of any color. If this mana is spent to cast a creature spell, that creature enters with an additional +1/+1 counter on them.
[i]Green Lance[/i] – Whenever Sain, Lovestruck Knight attacks, if you control a Noble, search your library for a card with a basic land type and put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
